response.overview: A home movie by Mario Perez with a compilation of different scenes from 1995 to 2003. In 1995, Mario records several landmark places for the gay community, including gay bars and the piers. There is also footage of him, David and some friends hanging out by Christopher Street. On Easter Sunday, he and David document Downtown New York City. Finally, includes footage from a trip to Cuba in 2003, where Mario records his family and their domestic life. The original version of this home movie included nudity of men in the piers. This version has been edited to protect the privacy of the people involved.
response.title: Perez_0016
